name: Restless Ghost
Start point: Father Aereck in the Lumbridge Chapel.
Description: Father Aereck, the priest in Lumbridge chapel, is having problems with a ghost in the graveyard. He needs your help.
Recommended: Combat level sufficient to defeat a level 13 Skeleton (optional, fighting can be avoided).

substeps: Speak to Father Aereck in the Lumbridge Chapel. He will ask you to talk to Father Urhney.
Travel south-west from Lumbridge, deep into the Lumbridge Swamp.
Find Father Urhney in a small shack in the south-east part of the swamp.
Speak to Father Urhney. He will give you an Amulet of ghostspeak.

substeps.caption: A player speaking with the ghost.

substeps: Return to the Lumbridge graveyard, located behind the church.
Open the stone coffin inside the small crypt building.
Speak to the Restless Ghost that appears. He will tell you his skull was stolen and taken to the Wizards' Tower.
Travel south from Lumbridge, across the bridge, to the Wizards' Tower.
Enter the tower and climb down the ladder to the basement.
Search the altar at the end of the room. You will find the Ghost's skull.
A level 13 Skeleton will appear and attack. You can either kill it or quickly run out of the basement with the skull.
Return to the Lumbridge graveyard crypt.
Ensure you are *not* wearing the Amulet of ghostspeak.
Use the Ghost's skull on the coffin.
The ghost will appear, thank you, and disappear.
Quest complete! Your reward is automatically given.
